news.title: Man develops rare condition after ChatGPT query over stopping eating salt
news.summary: US medical journal article about 60-year-old with bromism warns against using AI app for health information. A man developed a rare condition following an interaction with the chatbot.

news.title: In the time of tariffs, Nvidia and AMD cut unusual deals with Trump
news.summary: Two chipmakers make revenue-sharing pledges, OpenAI reveals GPT-5 and AOL bids dial-up adieu Hello, and welcome to TechScape. My Spotify playlists are undergoing a British invasion this week. Here’s what I’m listening to:  PinkPantheress ,  Lola Young  and  Evita in London .   Continue reading...

news.title: Mandrake – the rural life sim that lets you befriend a river and eavesdrop on the dead
news.summary: Mandrake is a take on rural life simulation Failbetter’s take on country life has its comforting routines but slowly reveals a richer and stranger life than you expect. It possesses the same undeniable allure as classics like Harvest Moon and Stardew Valley.
